text: Lisa Emery (born January 29, 1952) is an American actress. Her stage credits include The Matchmaker, Dinner with Friends (1999), What the Butler Saw (2000), The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie (2006), Talley & Son, Burn This (1987), Rumors, Present Laughter, The Women (2001), Marvin's Room (1991), Abigail's Party (2005) and Relatively Speaking (2011). Emery has appeared in movies such as A Map of the World, Unfaithful, The Night Listener and Margot at the Wedding. On television, she has appeared in episodes of Ed, Law & Order, Law & Order: Special Victims Unit, Law & Order: Criminal Intent, Third Watch, Fringe, Damages and Jessica Jones. Since 2017, she has starred as Darlene Snell in the Netflix drama series Ozark. Emery was born in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. She was married to actor Josh Pais from 1990 to 2003. The couple have a son. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Pittsburgh Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors
title: Lisa Emery
